topics.body:
Well I just had an interesting moment. 

My Chinese roommate just wished me Happy New Year. I wished him Happy New Year back.
Guess what's happening tomorrow. (Then again, it is _tomorrow_ over there)

And yes, we understood the circumstances, so it's not some cultural confusion thing.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
Preface: everything is currently fine and under control at the moment

So my mom had to go to the emergency room (again, nothing serious everything's under control) so that's a fun way to start the morning

But on the way in to go back to the room, you have to go through a metal detector and you have to empty your pockets and all that
As I'm going through the security guard said in the most professional ass manner "is that a 3ds, sir?" Which is unusual but I say yeah. So then he says, again, in the most professional ass manner "are you a fan of monster hunter sir?"

Cool guard
Coolest guard
